https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tglfGYH372S7Pft0hUyYLsO8M2B.jpg A story of yakuza family from 1999 to 2019. Kenji Yamamotoâ€™s father died from using a stimulant drug. His life fell into desperation. Kenji Yamamoto then joined a crime syndicate. There, he meets the gang's boss Hiroshi Shibasaki. Hiroshi Shibasaki reaches out to Kenji Yamamoto and they developed a relationship like father and son. As time passes, Kenji Yamamoto has his own family. A Family
